text: North Las Vegas is a suburban city in Clark County, Nevada, United States, in the Las Vegas Valley. As of the 2020 census, 262,527 people lived here. The city was founded on May 1, 1946. It is the fourth-largest city by population in the state. == References == Category:1946 establishments in the United States Category:1940s establishments in Nevada Category:Cities in Nevada
title: North Las Vegas, Nevada
